C

chargeCredit(double) - Method in class account.CreditCard
When making a purchase with a Credit Card, the card will be charged, increasing the credit balance which is the amount the customer owes.
CreditCard - Class in account
The CreditCard class represents a customer's creditcard and stores information based on their card number.

P

payBill(double) - Method in class account.CreditCard
Before proceeding to pay off the credit card's bill/balance which is the amount the customer owes, payBill checks if the amount entered to pay bills is valid.
printAllCreditCards(int) - Static method in class account.CreditCard
printAllCreditCards retrieves the information of all the credit cards of a certain account ID.
printCreditCardDetails() - Method in class account.CreditCard
This method prints out the credit card object's attributes on System Terminal for viewing.
printTransactionHistory() - Method in class account.CreditCard
printTransactionHistory shows the transaction history of the credit card when it was charged or when the balance was paid off.
